description.p: Built to make you extraordinarily productive, Cursor is the best way to code with AI.
Trusted by engineers at Tab, Tab, Tab.
Cursor lets you breeze through changes by predicting your next edit.
Knows your codebase: get answers from your code or refer to files/docs, then insert the modelâ€™s code in one click.
Edit in natural language: write code using instructions or update entire classes/functions with a simple prompt.
Build software faster: intelligent, fast, and familiar, Cursor is the best way to code with AI.
Frontier Intelligence: powered by a mix of purpose-built and frontier models, Cursor is smart and fast.
Feels Familiar: import all your extensions, themes, and keybindings in one click.
Privacy Options: if you enable Privacy Mode, your code is never stored remotely. Cursor is SOC 2 certified.

screenshot.caption: A Rust function with added error handling generated by Cursor, highlighted changes, and reviewer comments on the right discussing the update and version support.

release.description: Simplified Pricing, Background Agent and Refreshed Inline Edit.
